page.title: 11RECREATION IN CASTLE VALE
page.content: WE DID A SURVEY ABOUT RECREATION AND ASKED MANY PEOPLE OF ALL AGES TO FILL IN A QUESTIONAIRRE SO WE COULD FIND OUT WHAT THEY DO IN THEIR SPARE TIME. WE FOUND THAT ON OUR ESTATE OVER 50% OF THOSE ASKED HAVE MORE THAN 15 HOURS OF SPARE TIME A WEEK. IT SEEMS THAT MOST OF THIS SPARE TIME IS SPENT AT HOME AND THE MOST POPULAR PASTTIME IS WATCHING T.V.THE AVERAGE TIME SPENT ON T.V. EACH NIGHT IS 3-5 HOURS.MANY PEOPLE INTERVIEWED HAVE HOBB ES SUCH AS READING,KNITTING,SEWING GARDENING AND COOKING IT APPEARS THAT ONLY10% OF THOSE INTERVIEWED HAVE JOINED A CLUB IN WHICH TO SPEND THERE FREE TIME.
